name: Tomato Smush
description:
Stay cool in the fridge! Don't be turned into a smushy.

You are a tomato living in a fridge and you need to dodge everything falling on to you while staying hydrated.

This very addictive and fun free game includes:

> 21 levels of increasing difficulty
> 5 unlocks which will impact the levels
> 20 achievements in game center
> 1 leaderboard
